feature.description: Tools for developing applications for Oracle WebLogic Server (versions 12.2.x, 12.1.x, 10.3.x, 10.0 and 9.2).
feature.name: Oracle WebLogic Server Tools

feature.description: Additional tools for developing Oracle Cloud applications.
feature.name: Oracle Cloud Tools

feature.description: Tools for developing applications for GlassFish.
feature.name: GlassFish Tools

feature.description: Provides WTP server adapters for JBoss installations. These adapters are capable of deployment and providing classpaths for projects. Zipped or exploded deployments, JMX integration, and other extensions are included.
feature.name: JBoss AS, WildFly & EAP Server Tools

feature.description: Provides Tooling to work with OpenShift architectural version 3.
feature.name: JBoss OpenShift 3 Tools
